text.beaconbreakers.invulnerability.ende: Beacons are no longer invulnerable to mining.
text.beaconbreakers.cannot_break_own_bea: You cannot break your own beacon.
text.beaconbreakers.cannot_break_invulne: You cannot break a beacon during the invulnerability period.
text.beaconbreakers.cannot_place_out_of_: You cannot place a beacon outside of the map.
